articles.author: Des Bieler
articles.title: Texas man pleads guilty, sentenced to prison for stalking Caitlin Clark - The Washington Post
articles.description: Michael Lewis, 55, traveled to Indianapolis and sent Clark “numerous threats and sexually explicit messages,” authorities said, from a hotel near the Fever’s arena.
articles.content:
A Texas man arrested in Indianapolis on charges of stalking Caitlin Clark was sentenced to more than two years in prison, authorities announced Monday.
Michael Lewis, 55, pleaded guilty to a felony … [+3468 chars]
